data.lyric:
[ti:Money Over Fallouts]
[ar:Tory Lanez]
[al:DAYSTAR]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Money Over Fallouts - Tory Lanez
[00:00.53]Media Montage：
[00:00.74]It's one of the crazier stories we've heard of guys
[00:03.04]I know
[00:03.47]As it's unfolding it's like
[00:04.72]F**k Tory Lanez okay
[00:05.37]Now I'm from Houston and he's from bro
[00:06.67]And to think that the whole night unfolded on social media
[00:08.14]You are the alleged shooter of Megan Thee Stallion
[00:09.92]Instagram in the pool with Kylie Jenner
[00:11.17]Was she backtracking with what she said originally
[00:12.96]You know maybe that's why we don't have a report
[00:15.35]Donkey of the day
[00:16.18]Some b***hes tryna take up for Tory and
[00:17.88]It's more to the story b***h it ain't-there ain't nothing to the story
[00:20.25]Tory Lanez got a lot of bad press
[00:21.69]Serious he's gon' get deported
[00:23.28]Donkey of the day for Friday August 21st goes to Daystar Peterson
[00:26.43]So they got pulled over and she had been shot already great
[00:28.46]Well hold up
[00:29.23]Donkey of the Day
[00:30.00]What I'm looking like he looking at the police and then shot her
[00:31.88]N***as like that you a sucker he's the king sucker
[00:33.56]He's the-he's the biggest sucker in the industry
[00:35.47]Facts
[00:35.63]We gotta talk about Tory Lanez and Megan Thee Stallion
[00:36.89]Kaash is looking for you dawg
[00:37.67]Because the police came out saying
[00:38.99]We didn't even know she was shot
[00:40.37]Guess who I believe
[00:41.39]Megan
[00:41.61]The best thing for Tory Lanez is for real
[00:43.59]He needs to just begone
[00:45.35]I'm done with this you gotta know the truth
[01:09.38]Ayy they rather see me in the cell
[01:11.47]Like how he posted out with thirty thousand dollar bail
[01:13.95]I'm the GOAT y'all n***as know
[01:15.03]I made that d**e float on the scale
[01:16.54]I had them h*es going crazy fiends cracking going pale
[01:18.98]They know I'm real I got that flow
[01:20.36]It's on sale if you need a rush
[01:22.09]Coke blowing out my fiend's nose like the speaker bus
[01:24.56]Ho caught me D'd up talk down we T'ing up
[01:27.09]Megan people tryna frame me for a shooting
[01:28.94]But them boys ain't clean enough
[01:30.18]I see how they teaming up watching and I'm calculating
[01:32.85]Gotta keep it quiet I can't jeopardize the outcome waiting
[01:35.39]Seeing certain n***as hating like how this n***a hating
[01:38.04]I done gave these people
[01:39.10]So much features made these n***as famous
[01:40.47]They was on the blog sayin'
[01:41.82]I'm canceled from this entertainment
[01:43.09]I was on that Spotify like thirty million monthly listeners
[01:45.44]I'm f**king going crazy
[01:46.99]And my fans support me brazy
[01:48.13]Everything I do is for you
[01:49.59]I promise I'll be on it daily
[01:50.82]I got nothing but love to spread
[01:52.16]But n***as hate me
[01:52.96]Hurt my heart to see them Twitter fingers come from
[01:54.79]Kehlani's and Kaash Paige's
[01:55.69]But I flipped the switch I'm gripping money at that fast pace
[01:58.37]And don't ask me for s**t
[01:59.54]When it get real that's my last favor
[02:01.17]Can't cry now 'cause I'ma laugh later
[02:02.90]Girl you had the nerve to write that statement on that affidavit
[02:05.74]Knowing I ain't do it but I'm coming at my truest
[02:07.86]Tryna keep this s**t two hunnid with you shorty I can prove it
[02:10.30]But them people in yo ear they the true ones that I fear
[02:12.89]They really got you thinking Tory Lanez would do you in for real
[02:15.45]Don't forget you was my b***h I held it down and kept it real
[02:18.05]I would never paint no fake picture of you just for some mills
[02:20.62]And I thought that you was solid too
[02:22.10]But look at how you doing me
[02:23.47]Look at how you doing me people tryna ruin me
[02:26.11]And what's even worse is
[02:27.30]I'm still thinking about you and me
[02:28.73]How you going live my birthday
[02:29.96]With all your jewelry to try to make some fool of me
[02:32.40]But I love you hard so I'm gon' cool it B
[02:34.39]'Cause I was cooling right with Cuban B that was a stupid me
[02:36.97]Somehow I'm still down to renegotiate the unity
[02:39.43]My heart in some foolery this s**t is just confusing me
[02:41.94]I'm going through these phases
[02:42.93]But I gotta stack that paper
[02:44.30]And the real estate n***as hating took me off that application
[02:46.93]But when they took that from me
[02:48.20]They really took that from my baby
[02:49.49]What the f**k I'm finna say to his old lady
[02:51.22]What the f**k y'all mean my son don't need a house
[02:53.47]My baby momma don't need safety
[02:54.61]And even though I got the payment the real estate n***as still hating
[02:57.16]'Cause he watching me all on the news
[02:58.73]But I ain't charged with no cases
[03:00.16]Say the owner say my case is looking crazy
[03:02.02]How the f**k that even make sense
[03:03.52]New times turn to past tense
[03:05.26]All I want is straight cash n***as say I lack sense
[03:07.88]Star player hearing lies coming from the back bench
[03:10.10]Kill or be killed that's the reason I don't have friends
[03:12.91]N***as lying on the crodie n***as saying I'm deported
[03:15.64]Oh now I'm 5'3"
[03:17.05]N***as saying I'm a shorty
[03:18.17]But lil' b***h I'm 5'7"
[03:19.44]Money on me side-stepping
[03:20.61]And if I stand on my wallet
[03:21.94]You can see my thighs in Heaven
[03:23.09]One Umbrella gang
[03:24.15]And when we come back don't you try reppin'
[03:25.93]'Fore I let these n***as breathe
[03:27.08]I gotta teach a couple lessons
[03:28.44]Gotta see a couple questions
[03:29.59]How the f**k you get shot in your foot don't hit no bones or tendons
[03:32.29]How the f**k your team is tryna to paint me as some whole menace
[03:34.64]I just lost like ten million dollars because this cold business
[03:37.31]But I got like ten million followers that's gon' roll with me
[03:39.78]Fans that support me 'cause they know my heart
[03:41.72]So I don't give a d**n if shorty know Jigga
[03:43.78]I was taught to beat the block
[03:45.12]Eeny meeny miney in these streets and so my Nina cocked
[03:47.59]N***as y'all can play me y'all can frame me
[03:49.09]But I'ma reach the top
[03:50.16]I would never put you in no danger
[03:51.59]And if I did you would've said it when you seen the cops
[03:54.14]Ayy Lamborghini bands and they coming out the floor
[03:57.22]Fff hit the fan when I'm pulling out the dough-oh
[03:59.81]I would never fall out with n***as over h*es ayy
[04:02.21]Money over fall outs my n***a that's the code-oh
[04:04.84]Santorini bands when I pull up to the coast
[04:07.13]Better have my bands when I pull up to the door-oh
[04:09.94]N***as can't believe I done pulled up in a Ghost
[04:12.22]And I don't ever wanna f**k with y'all no more G
[04:15.48]I got bad b***hes tryna have an orgy
[04:17.66]Keep umbrellas for the days it get stormy
[04:20.20]I pour the Henny for my n***as that's before me
[04:22.77]My outfit fly you gotta seat out by the floor seats
[04:25.30]She tatted me all on her face 'cause she adore me
[04:27.96]They talking petty 'bout me but they looking corny
[04:30.61]I had to fight for mine n***a you were sworn in
[04:33.07]And God bless me when I wake up every morning
data.trans:
[ti:Money Over Fallouts]
[ar:Tory Lanez]
[al:DAYSTAR]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:00.53]媒体蒙太奇：
[00:00.74]这是我们听过的男人最疯狂的故事
[00:03.04]我知道
[00:03.47]随着剧情的发展
[00:04.72]去他的ToryLanez好吧
[00:05.37]现在我来自休斯顿他来自兄弟
[00:06.67]想到整晚都在社交媒体上展现
[00:08.14]据说你是MeganTheeStallion的枪手
[00:09.92]Instagram上和KylieJenner在泳池里晒照
[00:11.17]她是否回到了她最初说的话
[00:12.96]你知道也许这就是我们没有报告的原因
[00:15.35]每天都像驴子一样
[00:16.18]有些女人想模仿Tory
[00:17.88]这与故事本身无关碧池这无关紧要
[00:20.25]ToryLanez名声大噪
[00:21.69]认真的他会被驱逐出境
[00:23.28]八月二十一日星期五的驴子去找戴斯塔尔彼得森
[00:26.43]他们把她拦下来她中了一枪已经很好了
[00:28.46]等等
[00:29.23]一天之驴
[00:30.00]我现在的样子他看着警察然后朝她开枪
[00:31.88]像他一样的家伙你是个他是王
[00:33.56]他是这个行业最牛的
[00:35.47]事实
[00:35.63]我们得谈谈ToryLanez和MeganThee种马的事
[00:36.89]Kaash在找你兄弟
[00:37.67]因为警察出来说
[00:38.99]我们甚至不知道她中枪了
[00:40.37]猜猜我相信谁
[00:41.39]梅根
[00:41.61]对ToryLanez来说最好的事情是真的
[00:43.59]他得赶紧离开
[00:45.35]我受够了你得知道真相
[01:09.38]他们宁愿看到我蹲监狱
[01:11.47]就像他带着三万块保释金离开
[01:13.95]我是史上最强你们都知道
[01:15.03]我让那种东西漂浮在天平上
[01:16.54]我让那些娘们疯了疯了一样的人脸色发白
[01:18.98]他们知道我是真实的我有那种flow
[01:20.36]如果你需要一点刺激
[01:22.09]那种东西从我的朋友鼻子里喷出来就像公交车一样
[01:24.56]妹子发现我兴奋无比我们兴奋无比
[01:27.09]梅根的人都想诬陷我
[01:28.94]但这些小子不够干净
[01:30.18]我看见他们齐心协力监视着我我在盘算
[01:32.85]必须保持安静我不能破坏结果等待
[01:35.39]看到有些人恨我就像这个人恨得咬牙切齿
[01:38.04]我给了这些人
[01:39.10]这么多人让这些家伙名声大噪
[01:40.47]他们在博客上说
[01:41.82]我被这场娱乐取消了
[01:43.09]我当时在Spotify上每个月都有三千万听众
[01:45.44]我要疯了
[01:46.99]我的粉丝支持我疯狂无比
[01:48.13]我所做的一切都是为了你
[01:49.59]我保证我会每天都如此
[01:50.82]我只有爱可以传播
[01:52.16]可有些人恨我
[01:52.96]看到他们发推特的时候我的心好痛
[01:54.79]科赫拉尼和卡什·佩吉的店
[01:55.69]可我一触即发我以飞快的速度挣钱
[01:58.37]别跟我要什么
[01:59.54]当一切成真这是我最后的恩惠
[02:01.17]现在不能哭因为我会笑起来
[02:02.90]姑娘你有胆量在宣誓书上写下这些话
[02:05.74]我知道我不会这样做但我要做最真实的自己
[02:07.86]我想和你在一起姑娘我可以证明
[02:10.30]但你听到的那些人是我最害怕的人
[02:12.89]他们真的让你以为ToryLanez真的会干掉你
[02:15.45]别忘了你曾是我的女人我不会拐弯抹角
[02:18.05]我永远不会为了钱而对你虚情假意
[02:20.62]我以为你也很可靠
[02:22.10]但是看看你对我的态度
[02:23.47]看看你对我的态度人们都想毁了我
[02:26.11]更可怕的是
[02:27.30]我依然想着你和我的事
[02:28.73]你打算怎么过我的生日
[02:29.96]你戴着金银珠宝试图愚弄我
[02:32.40]可我深爱着你所以我会冷静下来
[02:34.39]因为我和古巴女人在一起我真的好傻
[02:36.97]不知何故我依然愿意重新协商团结一致
[02:39.43]我的心蠢蠢欲动这让我很困惑
[02:41.94]我正在经历这些阶段
[02:42.93]可我得拼命挣钱
[02:44.30]那些恨我的地产商把我从申请名单上抹去
[02:46.93]但当他们夺走我的一切
[02:48.20]他们真的从我的宝贝那里夺走了一切
[02:49.49]我要对他的女人说什么
[02:51.22]你们什么意思我儿子不需要房子
[02:53.47]我的宝贝妈妈不需要安全感
[02:54.61]即使我赚到盆满钵满可房地产商依然恨我
[02:57.16]因为他在新闻上关注着我
[02:58.73]但我不会被起诉
[03:00.16]店主说我的案子看起来很疯狂
[03:02.02]这一切怎么可能有意义
[03:03.52]新的时代变成了过去时
[03:05.26]我想要的只是钞票有些人说我缺乏理智
[03:07.88]明星球员听到替补席上传来谎言
[03:10.10]要么杀戮要么被杀戮这是我没有朋友的原因
[03:12.91]有些人躺在地上说我被驱逐出境
[03:15.64]如今我身高五尺三寸
[03:17.05]有人说我是个美女
[03:18.17]但是小碧池我身高五尺七寸
[03:19.44]我腰缠万贯四处逃窜
[03:20.61]如果我站在我的钱包上
[03:21.94]你可以看见我在天堂的大腿
[03:23.09]一个雨伞帮
[03:24.15]当我们回来的时候你不要试图代表我
[03:25.93]在我让这些家伙喘口气之前
[03:27.08]我得吸取教训
[03:28.44]我想问几个问题
[03:29.59]你怎么会被子弹打中你的脚没有伤到骨头和筋
[03:32.29]你的团队怎么把我描绘成威胁
[03:34.64]我刚刚失去了一千万因为这冰冷的事业
[03:37.31]但我有一千万粉丝他们会跟着我
[03:39.78]粉丝支持我因为他们了解我的心
[03:41.72]所以我不在乎姑娘是否了解我
[03:43.78]我从小就被教导要走遍街头
[03:45.12]我在街头混得风生水起
[03:47.59]你们可以玩弄我你们可以陷害我
[03:49.09]但我会到达巅峰
[03:50.16]我绝不会让你陷入危险
[03:51.59]如果我知道你会在看到警察的时候告诉我
[03:54.14]兰博基尼跑车一路狂飙
[03:57.22]当我掏出枪来的时候我打开了风扇
[03:59.81]我永远不会为了女人和男人闹翻
[04:02.21]钞票源源不断我的兄弟这是我的原则
[04:04.84]当我开车来到圣托里尼岛的海边
[04:07.13]当我出现在门口时最好把我的钞票拿来
[04:09.94]有些人不敢相信我开着劳斯莱斯幻影
[04:12.22]我再也不想和你们在一起了
[04:15.48]我有很多漂亮妞想要纵享欢愉
[04:17.66]狂风暴雨的日子随时带着伞
[04:20.20]我为我面前的兄弟倒一杯轩尼诗红酒
[04:22.77]我的衣服超有型你得坐在地板旁边
[04:25.30]她把我纹在她的脸上因为她喜欢我
[04:27.96]他们说我的坏话可他们看起来很粗俗
[04:30.61]我必须为我的兄弟而战你发过誓
[04:33.07]每天早上醒来上帝都会保佑我
